column1: Topic: Land Area and Land Use
Table Title: Forest Area (Including Mangroves) With Respect To The Total Land Area Of Singapore, Annual
Percentage Of Forests (Including Mangroves) To Total Land Area
Data align with Singapore's biennial reporting cycles to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change.  The figures for 2019 to 2022 are based on projections and are subject to revision.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
